title: MAHrokh | My Website
name: I'm Mahrokh Nabizadeh.
aboutMeText:
Hello, welcome to my website :)
                I was born in 1997 in Tehran.
                I've got my bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering at University of Tehran
                and my master's degree in MBA at University of Science and Culture.
                I worked on creating contents for websites and social media, and creating videos and image contents
                about 4 years.
                Then I was attracted to programming...
                At first, I learned programming mostly through self-learning, and
                then I developed it in my work environment.
                I have been programming for about 2 years now.
                I play Piano and watching movies in my free time, and I work on different programming challenges,
                I love to seek new thing that challenges me!
masterUniDegree: Masters's degree, Mater of Business Administration - MBA, Strategy
